body.name: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Dream Lengths Super Detangling Conditioner With Fine Castor Oil and Vitamins B3 and B5 for Long, Damaged Hair, Instantly Detangles To Reduce Breakage With System, 28 Fl Ounce

features: Revive long, damaged hair inch by inch with elvive Dream lengths formulated with fine castor oil and vitamins B3 and B5
Strengthen hair's length and help seal split ends with elvive Dream lengths shampoo, conditioner and no haircut cream leave in conditioner
Creamy super Detangler conditioner instantly detangles to reduce breakage, apply to lengths only to avoid greasy roots
For best results, use the full Dream lengths system, after shampoo, leave on Dream lengths conditioner for 1 to 3 minutes and rinse, Follow with no haircut cream
Dreaming about beautiful Lengths and healthy-looking ends - Say goodbye to damaged lengths with Dream lengths
body.description: Long hair goals? Stop cutting. Elvive dream lengths, with a cocktail of vitamins and fine castor oil, strengthens hair's length and helps seal split ends. To save your length inch by inch. Dream lengths restoring shampoo visibly repairs damage without weight down, dream lengths super Detangler conditioner instantly detangles to reduce breakage and dream lengths no haircut cream leave in conditioner helps seal split ends and reduces breakage. In just 1 use, elvive revives damaged hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good/I leave in for my braids
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell. Use on whole head and rinse. Then leave in area to braid. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my faves!
reviews.reviewText: I switch up my hair products occasionally but this is one I always come back to! I love the scent and the softness is so good! I have thick wavy hair so its important that I have good shampoo and conditioner to help me manage it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My hair is quite long so it tangles really fast and I get annoyed and start cutting out the tangles but this is a game changer, I don't know what is in it but it helps with my tangled hairAlso smells yummy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Be prepared for the scent.
reviews.reviewText: The company claims it has a light orange-like smell. I don't know what they are talking about- mine has quite a strong smell (that smells almost exactly like Johnson and Johnson baby powder), and it really lingers in your hair for a long time. Like, through a thorough shampooing, and using a clarifying shampoo on my daughters' hair, you could still catch whiffs of it from both of our heads thanks to it doing its' job and penetrating all the good stuff into the strand. This isn't necessarily a bad thing, but having a head that smells like a baby's butt for days is something that is good to know before you go in.The company also says it is color safe, but this definitely pushed the dye out of my hair a lot faster than any other conditioner I have tried. Not a problem as I can rotate it with a color depositing daily conditioner, but again good to know before going it.Other than that, it does indeed make my hair feel soft and easier to brush through. I will still use it, just not as often because I am not crazy about the strong, lingering perfumey scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. It works.
reviews.reviewText: My hair is so tangly and rips out after showering. This is better than some expensive brands. I can't afford it. I can afford this and it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use it for my dry hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I wanted to love this...
reviews.reviewText: I'm going to start with the positives:- I love the scent. I usually buy fruity shampoos and conditioners, while this smells like something you would be given in a salon. I did not expect to like it so much because it's so different from what I usually buy, but it's very nice! Not too strong or overpowering.- It made my hair very silky after the first use! I had been out of conditioner for over a week at that point and was really in need of some. I was extremely impressed with it, and loved the smooth texture of my hair.Now for the negatives:-My hair has a very fine texture that tangles easily, and especially so when using this. I honestly thought I outgrew hair that tangles this badly, but apparently I've just been using good conditioner! My hair stays okay for a day and then it's a rats nest overnight. I have to use a lot of this to keep my hair like it usually is... It's not worth having cheaper shampoo and conditioner if I need to use so much more of it!But, I feel this is most likely ba problem caused by my hair texture, and most people won't see much of a difference. If you're someone like mom, who can go a week without brushing her hair with more than her fingers and it looks perfect, then I think this conditioner would work fine for you. People with hair that tangles at the drop of a hat, on the other hand? I recommend staying away, unless you're also planning to use a hair oil treatment every week!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this conditioner. Will buy again.

All of the products on this L'Oreal pairs dream lengths line are amazing. They really work and help hair growth. the smell is amazing. The heat slayer spray works great. Also the curl cream works great and smells great. It's worth the money. Try it!

reviews.reviewTitle: My kids love this and so do I
reviews.reviewText: This is awesome for long hair that tangles easily, it works great and leaves your hair soft and manageable!
Amazingly priced compared to other store and away bigger size. This is the only conditioner I use or ever will use
